Package org.opends.server.replication.server.changelog.file

Class ChangeNumberIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.opends.server.api.DirectoryThread
        • org.opends.server.replication.server.changelog.file.ChangeNumberIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public class ChangeNumberIndexer
extends DirectoryThread
    Thread responsible for inserting replicated changes into the ChangeNumber Index DB (CNIndexDB for short).

    Only changes older than the medium consistency point are inserted in the CNIndexDB. As a consequence this class is also responsible for maintaining the medium consistency point (indirectly through an ECLMultiDomainDBCursor).

      • isReplicaOffline

        public boolean isReplicaOffline​(DN domainDN,
                                int serverId)
        Indicates if the replica corresponding to provided domain DN and server id is offline.
        Parameters:
        domainDN - base DN of the replica
        serverId - server id of the replica
        Returns:
        true if replica is offline, false otherwise

      • publishUpdateMsg

        public void publishUpdateMsg​(DN baseDN,
                             UpdateMsg updateMsg)
                      throws ChangelogException
        Ensures the medium consistency point is updated by UpdateMsg.
        Parameters:
        baseDN - the baseDN of the domain for which the heartbeat is published
        updateMsg - the updateMsg that will update the medium consistency point
        Throws:
        ChangelogException - If a database problem happened

      • replicaOffline

        public void replicaOffline​(DN baseDN,
                           CSN offlineCSN)
        Signals a replica went offline.
        Parameters:
        baseDN - the replica's replication domain
        offlineCSN - the serverId and time of the replica that went offline

      • initiateShutdown

        public void initiateShutdown()
        Instructs the current thread to initiate the shutdown process. The actual shutdown of the thread is a best effort and is dependent on the implementation of the Thread.run() method.
        Overrides:

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:

      • notifyEntryAddedToChangelog

        protected void notifyEntryAddedToChangelog​(DN baseDN,
                                           long changeNumber,
                                           MultiDomainServerState cookie,
                                           UpdateMsg msg)
                                    throws ChangelogException
        Notifies the ChangelogBackend that a new entry has been added.
        Parameters:
        baseDN - the baseDN of the newly added entry.
        changeNumber - the change number of the newly added entry. It will be greater than zero for entries added to the change number index and less than or equal to zero for entries added to any replica DB
        cookie - the cookie of the newly added entry. This is only meaningful for entries added to the change number index
        msg - the update message of the newly added entry
        Throws:
        ChangelogException - If a problem occurs while notifying of the newly added entry.

      • clear

        public void clear​(DN baseDN)
        Asks the current thread to clear its state for the specified domain.

        Note: This method blocks the current thread until state is cleared.

        Parameters:
        baseDN - the baseDN to be cleared from this thread's state. null and DN.rootDN() mean "clear all domains".
